p: TIV-special IgG + antibody secreting cells (ASC) from mice were analyzed by ELISPOT assay on a polyvinylidene difluoride (PVDF) 96-well filtration plate (Millipore, MA) following the manufacturerâ€™s instructions for the Mouse IgG ELISpot BASIC kit (Mabtech, Sweden). The spots were read with an EliSpot Reader System ELRIFL04 (AID, Germany).
